com.ems.rest.controllers

Class EmployeeRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ems.rest.controllers.EmployeeRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="employee")
public class EmployeeRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class EmployeeRestController. This is rest controller exposes all rest end points to the outer world to manage all operations related to employee management.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GetMapping(value="/all")
public Response getAll()
        This rest method returns all employees from the database.
        Returns:
        the response object containing status, error message and output employee list.

      • getEmployeeById

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public Response getEmployeeById(@PathVariable
                                                            java.lang.String id)
        Gets the employee by id. This method return employee for given employee id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the response object containing status, error message and output employee list.

      • addEmployee

        @PostMapping(value="/add")
public Response addEmployee(@RequestBody
                                                        Employee emp)
        Adds the employee. This function add new employee to the json file database.
        Parameters:
        emp - the emp
        Returns:
        the response object containing status, error message and output employee list.

      • updateEmployee

        @PostMapping(value="/update")
public Response updateEmployee(@RequestBody
                                                              Employee emp)
        Update employee. This function update employee based upon given employee.
        Parameters:
        emp - the emp
        Returns:
        the response object containing status, error message and output employee list.

      • deleteEmployee

        @PostMapping(value="/delete/{id}")
public Response deleteEmployee(@PathVariable
                                                                   java.lang.String id)
        Delete employee. This function delete the employee from json file database based on given employee id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        Returns:
        the response object containing status, error message and output employee list.

      • filterEmployeeByAge

        @PostMapping(value="/filterbyage")
public Response filterEmployeeByAge(@RequestBody
                                                                        FilterOptions filterOptions)
        Filter employee by age. This function returns employee list based on given filter options.
        Parameters:
        filterOptions - the filter options
        Returns:
        the response object containing status, error message and output employee list.
